original_text: Take one piece of each kind of flat bread out of the basket: bread that has no oil in it, bread with oil in it and a biscuit. These are an offering to the Lord.
korean_text: 또 여호와 앞에 있는 무교병 광주리에서 떡 한 개와 기름 바른 과자 한 개와 전병 한 개를 가져다가

sentences.original_text: Take one piece of each kind of flat bread
sentences.korean_translation: 각 종류의 평면 빵 한 조각씩 가져가라

sentences.original_text: bread that has no oil in it
These are an offering to the Lord
